onGet

public Object onGet(Object pojo,
                    String fieldName,
                    Object value)
This method passes the proxy object in two cases: when the reference is an Aggregate and the type is Array or Vector. IPOJO does not use proxy in this cases.

Specified by:
onGet in interface org.apache.felix.ipojo.FieldInterceptor
Overrides:
onGet in class org.apache.felix.ipojo.handlers.dependency.Dependency

getObjectType

protected int getObjectType()
Method added to obtain the m_type field value of class Dependency. This field is used to determine the type of object to inject (0: Array, 1:List, 2:Vector, 3:Set)

Returns:

start

public void start()
Method overridden to modify m_proxyObject in Depedency with our ProxyFactory functionality: 1. If dependency is aggregate uses our ICasaServiceCollection. It allows the creation of proxies when iterator are used. 2. If dependency is scalar uses ICasaProxyFactory proxy factory

Overrides:
start in class org.apache.felix.ipojo.handlers.dependency.Dependency

public void stop()
Overrides:
